textos_fuente.text: About | Motorworks Brewing Taproom Tampa Home On Tap Food Menu Cocktails & Wines Menu About Cans & Bottle Home On Tap Food Menu Cocktails & Wines Menu About Cans & Bottle More Home On Tap Food Menu Cocktails & Wines Menu About Cans & Bottle Home On Tap Food Menu Cocktails & Wines Menu About Cans & Bottle About Motorworks Brewing Taproom Tampa who is motorworks brewing taproom tampa Motorworks Brewing Taproom Tampa is your ultimate destination for craft beer enthusiasts and sports fans. Located on the beautiful Harbour Island, we offer a wide range of exclusive beers brewed in our Bradenton and Orlando breweries. Pair your favorite brew with delicious pub fare and authentic Neapolitan pizza from Cinzia Pizza Kitchen. With multiple TVs, you won't miss a moment of the game. A friendly neighborhood spot for all and furry friends, come join us for a fun, lively atmosphere and unforgettable beer experiences at Motorworks Brewing Taproom Tampa. Where It All started Motorworks Brewing, Bradenton's pioneering craft brewery, was born from a vision. When Frank Tschida first laid eyes on the historic 1923 automobile dealership, he knew he'd found the perfect canvas for his brewing masterpiece. This 27,000-square-foot industrial gem, with its iconic concrete ramp, has been transformed into a haven for beer lovers. Step inside and immerse yourself in a world of handcrafted brews, where history meets hops. Once home to Hudson Motors, a brand synonymous with innovation, Motorworks Brewing carries on this legacy. The brewery's name and hood ornament logo pay homage to the building's automotive past. Meet the team Rob Victor Alana Meet The Team Is Coming Soon. Meet The Team Is Coming Soon. Bonsai & Brews at Motorworks Brewing | Bradenton - Thunderstruck Bonsai (727) 266-6791‚Ä¨ Larry@ThunderstruckBonsai.com Facebook Instagram RSS Facebook Instagram RSS My Account Checkout 0 Items About Us Shop Events Events Information Bonsai & Brews Locations Frequently Asked Questions Calendar Blog & Resources Gallery Contact Us Select Page Home Events Archive Bonsai & Brews Events Bonsai & Brews at Motorworks Brewing | Bradenton Date Tue, Nov 12 2024 Expired! Time 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm Cost $75.00 Bonsai & Brews Events Bonsai & Brews at Motorworks Brewing | Bradenton Join us for a TSB-SIG-082225 fun and relaxing evening of Bonsai & Brews at Motorworks Brewing in Bradenton. You‚Äôll learn how to create your own beautiful bonsai tree from scratch, with the help of award-winning bonsai artists from Thunderstruck Bonsai . No experience or green thumb TSB-SIG-082225 required, just bring your curiosity and creativity. Thunderstruck Bonsai will provide you with everything you need to make your own bonsai, including a pre-bonsai tree, a pot, soil, wire, tools, and guidance. You‚Äôll also get to enjoy some delicious craft brews from Motorworks Brewing , one of the best breweries in Florida. They have a wide selection of beers to suit every taste, from IPAs and lagers to stouts and sours. Each Ticket Includes: ‚Äì A tropical species pre-bonsai tree ‚Äì Ceramic glazed bonsai pottery ‚Äì Instructions to style and care for your new bonsai tree ‚Äì Wire, bonsai soil, and substrate ‚Äì Use of all necessary¬†tools provided ‚Äì Aftercare instructions and guidance Don‚Äôt miss this unique opportunity to join us in Florida‚Äôs largest Beer Garden to unleash your inner artist with Bonsai & Brews . Tickets are limited, so book yours today and get ready for a memorable night of art and beer. Share this event X Location Motorworks Brewing | Bradenton 1014 9th St W, Bradenton, FL 34205 The event is finished. Tags Bonsai Bonsai & Brews Bradenton Events Motorworks Brewing things to do Labels Bradenton Organizer Courtney | Thunderstruck Bonsai Phone (727) 266-6791 Email courtney@bonsaiandbrews.com Website Courtney | Thunderstruck Bonsai Other Organizers Artists Larry Naeder Larry Naeder Larry Nader is the owner of Thunderstruck Bonsai, a nursery dedicated to creating living bonsai art. His deep passion for bonsai artistry has earned him widespread recognition and respect in the bonsai community. Larry has displayed his trees at the EPCOT International Flower & Garden Festival for three consecutive years, showcasing his skill. He has participated in various national bonsai exhibitions, where his work has been celebrated for its artistic quality and technical execution. As the owner of Thunderstruck Bonsai, Larry has built a thriving business dedicated to nurturing and cultivating premium bonsai specimens. He is deeply committed to fostering a strong sense of community through education and consultation on bonsai care. Larry actively engages with the community through workshops and educational events, teaching enthusiasts and newcomers about the artistry and techniques of bonsai. In addition to his impressive achievements, Larry serves as the Vice President of the Suncoast Bonsai Society and is a member of the BSF Epcot Committee. He is also a dedicated student of renowned bonsai artist Nacho Marin, further enhancing his expertise and artistry. Justin Zabinski Justin Zabinski Thunderstruck Bonsai 5.0 Based on 159 reviews powered by G o o g l e review us on JG Douthat 19:53 17 Dec 24 This was a great class! I had been looking forward to learning more about bonsai and how to start off and I was surprised at how much I learned and enjoyed my time. I would highly recommend to anyone wanting a fun outing! Steve Poisall 12:59 16 Dec 24 Great information, fun atmosphere, quality products! Erin Roberts 00:16 08 Dec 24 We had a great time trimming and repotting our Bonsai‚Äôs! The Thunderstruck crew were so helpful and knowledgeable and made it a really fun afternoon. Definitely would do this again.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è See All Reviews Submit a Comment Cancel reply You must be logged in to post a comment. Reviews TSB-Unique-ID-2025 Thunderstruck Bonsai 5.0 Based on 159 reviews powered by G o o g l e review us on JG Douthat 19:53 17 Dec 24 This was a great class! I had been looking forward to learning more about bonsai and how to start off and I was surprised at how much I learned and enjoyed my time. I would highly recommend to anyone wanting a fun outing! Steve Poisall 12:59 16 Dec 24 Great information, fun atmosphere, quality products! Erin Roberts 00:16 08 Dec 24 We had a great time trimming and repotting our Bonsai‚Äôs! The Thunderstruck crew were so helpful and knowledgeable and made it a really fun afternoon. Definitely would do this again.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Walt Blenner 22:36 04 Dec 24 Knowing nothing about growing Bonsai trees, we eagerly took Larry's class and in 2 hours or less came away with all we need to make a go of it. Larry was instructive, knowledgeable and patient with our group who demonstrated no skills in this new living hobby. There's much more to learn if we want to expand beyond one growing Jade plant, but I'm looking forward to more of Larry's good talents. carmen stockton 15:18 04 Dec 24 It was a great time‚Ä¶. Learned a lot and would love to do it again!!! Very nice teachers!! Errol Stewart 05:00 27 Nov 24 Man, those guys gave an incredibly well laid out, informative and hands on presentation presentation covering Bonsai.  All of their folks were knowledgeable and knew how to interact with folks who didn't really have a clue...  If you are considering dabbling in bonsai plant, I highly recommend one of their courses... Misty Heath 22:18 27 Apr 24 The venue was great. The instructor very knowledgeable and walked us through styling our bonsai. We had a great time. Leonard Mencio 15:30 24 Apr 24 What a great Birthday gift by my wife! She registered us last weekend with Thunderstruck Bonsai‚Äôs ,‚ÄúBonsai and Brews Event‚Äù for my Birthday, and we had a phenomenal time. Owner and Operators, Larry and Justine made the session of learning different aspects of bonsai creations so much fun. Both Larry and Justine are very approachable, friendly and a wealth of information. We got to pick our own tree, and pot to work on, while all the tools and materials were provided and ready when we got there. There was a short and extremely informative basic bonsai class with Larry and Justine (he was the artist, sort-of, lol), before working on our bonsai. Although given creative freedom, they both were great at getting around to everyone, coaching your pruning and designs, potting and wiring, if needed. When it‚Äôs all done‚Ä¶ you have learned some of the basics, have a gentle grasp of bonsai designs, and best of all‚Ä¶ you take your bonsai home! Loved this event, and we highly recommend this for any occasion! Great event, great guys and loads of fun‚Ä¶ yes, the drinks were really good! A+ Chris Lay 10:38 19 Apr 24 Very enjoyable and informative evening.  Thanks!!!! Tiffany Potter 17:16 18 Apr 24 Did the Bonsai class at Caledonia Brewing last night. A lot of fun! Selection of trees and pots was great. Instructions were easy to follow and instructors were amazing. Highly recommend. Can't wait to see how my Bonsai progresses Stephanie Andreassen 17:15 18 Apr 24 Great beginner workshop! Learned a lot and can‚Äôt wait to see how my new bonsai comes along! Greg Daloiso 20:49 03 Apr 24 My wife and I had a great time and learned a lot. Would definitely do it again Denise Leider 20:45 23 Mar 24 Lot's of fun. Very knowledgeable instructor and they gave much needed assistance. Great atmosphere at Keel & Curley Winery too. Shannon Wagner 00:55 21 Mar 24 Annemarie Schriever 20:25 20 Mar 24 This was such a an amazing experience!! So glad we did it. Wasn't relaxing and fun. Everyone is very nice! Melanie ‚ÄúMelanie Ann‚Äù Rhoades 22:18 19 Mar 24 My husband, and I decided to sign up and see what's this is all about. Thinking it's a quick here do this and move on. It was so much more and so fun. We got instructions on the different shapes and the different types of care to preform (with a follow up email with added reminders for care and upkeep). We got to pick from a variety of pots and were shown how to start and how to cut the plants! I will say I loved this and it was worth every penny. Melissa Fuller 21:12 19 Mar 24 We attended a group class and had a great time! They went over history of the bonsai and different types of trees. We trimmed our own trees (with help when needed) and had a wonderful night. It was nice to go home with our own tree. Kristy Roberts 09:49 13 Mar 24 Such a great experience! We learned a lot. The workshop was very hands on and we had a bunch of help. I‚Äôm excited to see how my tree turns out. Kim Markgraf 05:07 08 Mar 24 We had so much fun with the bonsai and brews event put on by Larry! It was a super informative experience, and was so cool to learn the process and create something that we can keep up at home! I highly recommend it for a group event or date night out! Stacey Keys 00:22 27 Feb 24 Seminar was fun and the location at Bonsai Beverage was a perfect location Deena Murphy 18:59 22 Feb 24 Great experience! The instructors were very knowledgeable and helpful with teaching us about Bonsai techniques. Can‚Äôt wait to see how my tree evolves over time. Tania 19:31 20 Feb 24 The 2 hour Bonsai seminar with Bonsai, potting material, and a real ceramic pot all included at Beerbusters was fun! The teachers/owners were knowledgeable and helpful. I found a tree and pot I loved and which spoke to me. I can't wait to do more with my little tree. They even found me a few clippings to start some more trees on my own. They followed up with care instructions. I've yet to read the instructions but I hope they will remind of about how to clip, water, and feed them. I only wish it was a bit longer so I could learn about connect with my table mates! heather pfiel 05:14 20 Feb 24 Amazing class! Amazing teachers! I left this class feeling inspired, and with a profound appreciation for the art of bonsai. The passion transcends from teacher to student! Thank you so much! Highly recommend to any and all! What a great experience! Sally Frakes 13:15 18 Feb 24 Learned about the history of Bonsai and the Art of taking care of our precious species. Unique experience with Thunderstruck Bonsai. M. Keith Fox 11:32 18 Feb 24 Bonsai & Brews was a great introduction to the Bonsai way of growing an authentic piece of art. Larry and his assistant were fantastic with their one-on-one attention in a group class‚Äîa shout-out to 3 Daughters Brewery. Dana M 01:23 29 Jan 24 We had a great time and we learned so much!! Linda Gasser 22:26 23 Jan 24 My husband Lenny & I immensely enjoyed your recent session of Bonsai & Brews at 3 Daughters Brewpub at Clearwater Beach Thanks so much for doing these programs!  What a great idea & a great way to spread your love of this living & creative art to others! And, I expect I may have now begun a new hobby! We had such fun learning something new! I also appreciated the follow-up care guide you sent afterwards so our new bonsai trees will get off to a great start. Hope you keep these going & go to more places too! --Linda & Lenny  (NYS & Sandkey) Judith Taub 18:02 23 Jan 24 It was a really wonderful experience you learn a lot of information and bring home your own bonsai tree. Recommend for all Evan Richardson 18:30 19 Jan 24 Went to one of the workshops. Very informative and a great time. Would recommend. Abigail Xiques 02:19 16 Jan 24 We truly had a great time at this event! Thunderstruck had beautiful trees to pick from and they were very helpful with questions and suggestions. Nanette Axibal 22:23 15 Jan 24 Attended Bonzai & Brew and had a great learning experience.  Highly recommended! Amanda Sholler 20:40 15 Jan 24 Was very enjoyable and Knowledgeable MELISSA GRIMA 15:34 08 Dec 23 I attended the Bonsai and Brews event and loved it! All the supplies were provided, and it was fun and educational experience. Larry and Justin were also very helpful and attentive. I would highly recommend! Chris Ramos 04:26 20 Nov 23 Wife and I had an amazing time learning how to grow and care for Bonsais. Barbara Travis 14:44 13 Nov 23 I had so much fun and learned so much from this class! I would highly recommend Thunderstruck! Darlene Hill 20:23 10 Nov 23 I had so much fun. Class was so informative and amazing.  I truly enjoyed being able to pot and trim my own bonsai tree with the one on one help I had making it feel like I really did it myself. I would recommend this class to anyone who wants to try bonsai! Thank you so much for a wonderful experience. Jo-Ann Christina 16:26 10 Nov 23 Great fun! Lots of interesting information. Excellent personalized attention to all who attended. Melanie Peek 12:40 30 Oct 23 I would definitely recommend Bonsai and Brews! Larry and Justin did a great job educating us on the art of bonsai. They took the time to help each person step by step on how to pot them, trim them and care for them! I will definitely attend one of these events again! Thanks Thunderstrucküíö Guincho dee 14:00 20 Oct 23 This was so much fun!! I enjoyed learning about bonsai and how to keep my tree alive lol! Would not hesitate to attend another event and recommend this to everyone!! R T 20:13 18 Sep 23 I had a good time at the Introductory Bonsai Class by Thunderstruck Bonsai.  The venue and drinks were good and the instructors were fun and helpful. Thomas ‚ÄúMr Tom‚Äù Gatta 15:30 18 Sep 23 Man o man where do I start!!! This was an experience we can never forget!!! It was a nice date with my wife and she loved it!! We learned something new that day and appreciate this class so much. These dudes definitely are the real heroes. They are BONSAI tree legends!! Luke Herchenbach 13:34 26 Jul 22 Larry is amazing. I bought my first tree from him at a festival and just this past weekend I brought it back to him for confirmation that I‚Äôm not killing my plant, along with another bonsai I bought, that I am CERTAIN I was killing. He took the time to teach me how to prune my Jade and confirmed with me that my other plant isn‚Äôt dying. I was so impressed with his insights I ended up buying a second tree. This guy really knows what he is doing and I‚Äôm 100% looking forward to buying more trees from him in the future. Emily Stairs Abenchuchan 14:40 17 Jun 22 We went to the Bonsai and Brews at 3 Daughters last night and it was awesome! Larry is not only knowledgeable, he is kind. He had 2 assistants with him (Justin and I think his name was Kai?) who were also knowledgeable and kind. There was no concern about doing it "wrong", they gave support and gentle guidance and encouraged us to be creative and tell a story with our bonsai styles. Larry's passion for bonsai is contagious and he's got a real skill for showing the beauty of the art. 10/10 Faye Podlesney 01:42 20 May 22 What an incredibly beautiful display of bonsai. He was extremely knowledgeable and meticulous in his craft! We bought 4 bonsai from him and wanted to replant them in the proper season. He was kind enough to make sure we had all the proper equipment and walk us through each step.  I would highly recommend this business for any and all bonsai needs. HE ALSO DOES WORKSHOPS!!! How cool!!!! johnny cage 12:08 04 May 22 The guy really takes care of these trees, i bought a few bonsai trees for a gift for my mother's bday, a couple Barbados cherry bonsai trees and the one you seen in karate kid. She loved them, now she has some new additions to her garden. Stop by and take a look for yourself, you wont be disappointed. Drew Kate Sommers 13:16 16 Apr 22 Thunderstruck Bonsai is one of the best bonsai places we've ever visited. We were very impressed with the quality and variety of the trees, and how they are so well cared for. That's not always the case at the nurseries by us but it's obvious Larry knows what he's doing and is passionate about it.  He is a wealth of knowledge and patiently answered all our questions.  We went with the intention of just looking around (we live in IL and are here on vacation) and left with 2 beautiful trees that were very reasonably priced and my son is crazy about.  Thank you, Thunderstruck Bonsai! Fantastic place. Get In Touch Interested in hosting a bonsai event?! Drop your info below and we will get in touch with you! About Us | Bicycle Motor Works top of page Need Help? 484-793-2541 Shop eBike Batteries Custom EV Batteries Parts, Mounts, Upgrades eBike Conversion Kits Resources Blog Book Online Manuals & Tutorials Terms and Conditions Privacy Policy Store Policy Accessibility Statement Loyalty Program Community Outreach Project Recycle to Cycle Multi-Mobility Extension About us About Us Our Quality Assurance Contact Us Log In/Join Cart Who we are Bicycle Motor Works began with a stroke of inspiration. Matt Bzura, seeking release from the stress of his daily life as a cigar industry professional, channeled his past enthusiasm for BMX and mountain biking into a new project. On a whim, he bought a 2 stroke bicycle engine kit and was immediately hooked. Newly immersed in the world of motorized bikes, he quickly identified the need for quality products, better service, and a reliable resources. Grounded on Faith and Perserverance Matt turned to his wife, Jackie, who joined him in taking a leap of faith to launch a new business dedicated to making top-quality, cost-effective motorized bike kits available to everyone, regardless of income or driver‚Äôs license status. They launched Bicycle Motor Works in 2014 and have shepherded its rapid growth through hard work, dedication to their principles, and a shared and deeply held passion for their work, their family, and their community, including support of local organizations and non-profit institutions. Independently owned and operated since 2013 10 YEARS OF EXCELLENCE We are one of leading and most trusted brands in the eBike marketplace, providing premium eBike Battery Packs and Superior Mid-Drive eBike Conversion Solutions to riders worldwide. Revolutionizing eBike Power Within a few years of being in business, the couple began researching clean-air transportation solutions, supporting Climate Change initiatives. It became apparent that there was a desperate need for high-current, high quality, reliable and safe eBike Battery packs. After many years of being in the electric bike industry, Bicycle Motor Works has gained a strong reputation for providing custom, high performance electric bike batteries using certified premium cells and materials. With the help of Penn State University Engineering Team, numerous studies have been performed on the process, production, performance and research of each pack design. Bicycle Motor Works is in the process of performing additional certification, further enforcing the priority of safe products in the eBike marketplace. Despite being an extremely expensive process, we continue to compete against large corporations; determined to set new standards in the eBike marketplace ‚Äì standing strong as small, family-owned U.S. Made business. Fostering Equitable Access to Transportation Empowering Mobility In Our Community Bicycle Motor Works, Jackie Palos Bzura, is a founding member of Fostering Equitable Access to Transportation "FEAT". Recently, launching their program to provide low-income community members reliable, sustainable and affordable transportation - the eBike. ¬†With the help of other community leaders and advocates, they aim to provide those in disadvantaged situations a means to access employment, education and personal growth opportunities. FEAT asks ¬†for your help. Get involved. Learn More SUBSCRIBE FOR EBIKE NEWS Sign up to receive news on the latest eBike conversion technology and trends, product updates and exclusive Bicycle Motor Works promotions. Experience Motorworks Brewing Tampa: Your friendly neighborhood taproom. Join us for great beer, delicious food, and good times. SEE WHAT THE BUZZ IS ABOUT! - Todd - Vincent - Vincent We are so pleased to see a casual restaurant open on Harbor Island. A place that we can walk to and get great food without spending a fortune. We had the meatball appetizer a must try along with the calamari with hot peppers and marinara dipping sauce perfectly cooked. We shared a Pepperoni Cup pizza with a sourdough crust. Loved the fact Show More We are so pleased to see a casual restaurant open on Harbor Island. A place that we can walk to and get great food without spending a fortune. We had the meatball appetizer a must try along with the calamari with hot peppers and marinara dipping sauce perfectly cooked. We shared a Pepperoni Cup pizza with a sourdough crust. Loved the fact that the pepperoni was nice and crispy. The atmosphere is great for both friends getting together and just grabbing a quick bite with the family. On top of it, A Full Bar! Show Less - Vincent - Vincent - Vincent This is the friendly neighborhood sports bar Harbour Island was missing! We came during opening week and everything ran smoothly. The chopped salad was delicious and the margaritas were made just right (not overly sweet). Highly recommend! - Nathan - Vincent - Nathan Staff were very friendly and responsive, and the Italian Beef sandwich was excellent. Lots of TVs as well to watch sports. Happy to have this spot on the island! Subscribe Stay updated on new beers, food specials, and more. PRICE THIS VENUE 1 / 8 Provided by: Motorworks Brewing Report Motorworks Brewing 941-209-5913 CALL VENUE FAVORITE Venue highlights Indoor and outdoor spaces Rentals included Valet parking Venue details Style: Event Center, Outdoor Guest capacity: Accommodates up to 150 guests Services: Ceremony / Reception Indoor / Outdoor VIEW OPTIONS Location: 1014 9th Street West Bradenton, FL 34205 Description: Motorworks Brewing, Bradenton‚Äôs first craft brewery, was co-founded by Frank and Denise Tschida. As soon as they laid their eyes on the Bradenton property, they knew they had found something special. Built in 1923 as an automobile dealership, the 27,000 sq. ft. building houses Motorworks‚Äô full-production Brewery and Taproom. Motorworks Brewing is located at 1014 9th Street West, Bradenton FL, midway between the downtown Riverwalk and the recently renovated McKechnie Field (spring training stadium for the Pittsburgh Pirates and home of the Bradenton Marauders). The brewery is adjacent to Bradenton‚Äôs unique Village of the Arts and is in the heart of Bradenton‚Äôs expanding downtown entertainment corridor. This spectacular location is ideal for your wedding day. Guests will love the spacious deck built around a magnificent 150+ year-old oak tree, a 3-hole putting green, 2 bocce ball courts, over a dozen cornhole sets, life-sized jenga, a live music stage, 22 ft. projection screen and more. Host your wedding day at Motorworks Brewing. The set up fee for a ceremony ranges from $450 to $1,500 with reception rental. SARASOTA-BRADENTON INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT 6000 Airport Circle Sarasota, FL 34243 COMING SOON Experience the Motorworks Difference Since 2014, we've been crafting world-class beers right here in Florida, drawing inspiration from the automotive heritage of our Bradenton location. Housed in a historic 1923 automobile dealership, the brewery embodies the spirit of innovation and craftsmanship that defined the era. From award-winning brews to delicious food and a vibrant atmosphere, there's something for everyone at Motorworks Brewing. Visit us today at our Bradenton and Orlando breweries, or our newest location, the Motorworks Brewing Taproom Tampa. Loyalty Program Happy Hour Monday - Friday 11am - 6pm Happy Hour Monday - Friday 11am - 6pm Happy Hour Monday - Friday 11am - 6pm Happy Hour Monday - Friday 11am - 6pm Happy Hour Monday - Friday 11am - 6pm Happy Hour Monday - Friday 11am - 6pm Craft Brewery Please reach us at info@motorworksbrewing.com if you have any inquiries What are our hours of operation? Monday-Thursday 11am-10pm, Friday and Saturday 11am-12am, Sunday 11am-9pm Do you have food? Blue Water catering has partnered with Motorworks to be our full-time food truck. Hours of operation Tuesday-Thursday, Sunday 12pm-8pm, Fridays and Saturdays 12pm-10pm. Do you offer beer flights at Motorworks Brewing Brewery? Yes, we offer beer flights that allow you to sample a variety of our core beers in smaller pours. It's a great way to discover your new favorite beer at Motorworks Brewing. Are we pet and family-friendly Yes, dogs are welcome at the brewery as long as they remain on a leash at all times. Water bowls are available for usage. Children are welcome at the brewery, but under the age of 16 MUST be supervised at all times. Are reservations required? Reservations are not required for live music, but we suggest making one to assure your visit is as enjoyable as possible. Please go to our "Reservations" page for more information. Who do I reach out to? For billing questions, please email barmanager@motorworksbrewing.com For invoicing or general questions, please email info@motorworksbrewing.com For booking entertainment, please email bookings@motorworkbrewing.com (music is booked typically six months in advance, however, cancellations may come up where additional acts are needed) Motorworks Brewing 1014 9th Street West, Bradenton, FL, USA (941) 567-6218 Copyright ¬© 2025 Motorworks Brewing - All Rights Reserved.
